skills.title: Test Automation
skills.description: Expertise in writing and maintaining automated test scripts using Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, and Katalon to ensure efficient regression testing.

skills.title: Manual Testing & Test Case Design
skills.description: Proficient in writing detailed test cases, executing manual tests, and identifying critical defects in software.

skills.title: CI/CD & Deployment
skills.description: Hands-on experience in integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines, ensuring smooth deployments and early bug detection using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Azure DevOps.

skills.title: Backend API Testing
skills.description: Skilled in testing APIs using Postman and RestAssured to validate request/response integrity and performance.

skills.title: SQL & Data Validation
skills.description: Strong knowledge of SQL queries to validate backend data integrity and test database-driven applications.

skills.title: Performance Testing
skills.description: Experience in load and stress testing applications using JMeter and k6 to assess system reliability under different workloads.

skills.title: Defect Tracking
skills.description: Familiar with test management tools like JIRA and TestRail for tracking bugs, test coverage, and managing test execution.

skills.title: Mobile Testing
skills.description: Experience in mobile application testing across Android and iOS platforms using Appium, Espresso, and XCUITest.
